name: Simorgh, Bird of Beginnings
desc: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can activate this effect; during your Main Phase this turn, you can Normal Summon 1 "Simorgh" monster, in addition to your Normal Summon/Set. (You can only gain this effect once per turn.) If your opponent controls no cards in their Spell & Trap Zones, while this card is in your GY: You can Special Summon this card in Defense Position, but banish it when it leaves the field, also you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except Winged Beast monsters. You can only use each effect of "Simorgh, Bird of Beginnings" once per turn.
